title: Craig's Soil Mechanics 8th Edition c2012 Knappett & Craig tx
description:
Craig's Soil Mechanics, 8th Edition (c2012), textbook by Jonathan A. Knappett & Robert F. Craig.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.taylorandfrancis.com/books/details/9780415561266/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.taylorandfrancis.com/books/details/9780415561266/</a>
COMPANION WEBSITE: <a href=" http://www.taylorandfrancis.com/cw/craig-9780415561266/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.taylorandfrancis.com/cw/craig-9780415561266/</a>

CONTENTS:
---------
PART 1 - Development of a mechanical model for soil
 1. Basic characteristics of soils
 2. Seepage
 3. Effective stress
 4. Consolidation
 5. Soil behaviour in shear
 6. Ground investigation
 7. In-situ testing
PART 2 - Applications in geotechnical engineering
 8. Shallow foundations
 9. Deep foundations
 10. Advanced foundation topics
 11. Retaining structures
 12. Stability of self-supporting soil masses
 13. Illustrative cases

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (12 MB).
Solution manual to the 7th edition (2 MB) included for convenience. Files are foldered.
